alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 3:48PM CDT until May 31 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 348 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Putnam to 7 miles northeast of Sayre, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Hammon, Canute, Butler, Putnam, Moorewood, Foss Reservoir and Berlin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita
